survey_brief: This survey aims to understand patient experiences and satisfaction levels with telemedicine services, including ease of use, effectiveness, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often have you used telemedicine services in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often have you used telemedicine services in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: What types of medical consultations have you used telemedicine for? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or '6 or more times' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.

script.question_text: What types of medical consultations have you used telemedicine for? (Select all that apply)

Lower cost compared to in-person visits
